text: the Large Hadron Collider the most
spectacular particle accelerator in the
world designed by the greatest minds
alive so when it recently broke down
chaos ensued MIT professor Bob klapisch
had this to say it took a long time to
figure out the problem but give us a
break it's not like you can bring a
large hadron collider in to pepboys
perhaps they should have tried because
it wasn't an MIT professor who
discovered the problem it was the
janitor a family of possums built a nest
in one of the pipes here revealed lewis
carnesecca the janitor who discovered
the gliders shameful secret I heard some
scratching and chased them away with a
broom but it wasn't easy they put up
some kind of a fight fixing the
chewed-up wires means the clutter won't
be running until later in the year but
klapisch is optimistic as long as we can
keep the animals away he says we have a
chance at making history the offending
possums were unavailable for comment
